items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: Lightweight complete Dapp wallet built with Solidity and powered by Hardhat, designed for testing smart contracts on a local blockchain environment. It includes seamless integration with MetaMask and supports multiple local wallets for a smooth development and testing workflow. Admin Panel, GPT Wrapper & more. Built with React, NestJS, TS, Mongo
items.title: SeyZiiZ/Local-Dapp-TestNet: Lightweight complete Dapp wallet built with Solidity and powered by Hardhat, designed for testing smart contracts on a local blockchain environment. It includes seamless integration with MetaMask and supports multiple local wallets for a smooth development and testing workflow. Admin Panel, GPT Wrapper & more.    Built with React, NestJS, TS, Mongo

items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
items.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

items.content_html: areaEditor.js, a lightweight (<2kb) web-based code editor using JavaScript to enhance <textarea> with smart indentation & bracket pairing for smoother coding. 这是个根据 JavaScript 里几个关于操纵 HTML 原生文本编辑框元素 <textarea> API 而开发的增强版 <textarea> 运行库（迷你版代码编辑器）。它只有不到 2kb 大小，但它能大大增强您在编辑代码时的体验。(MIT License)
items.title: kohunglee/areaEditor: areaEditor.js, a lightweight (<2kb) web-based code editor using JavaScript to enhance <textarea> with smart indentation & bracket pairing for smoother coding. 这是个根据 JavaScript 里几个关于操纵 HTML 原生文本编辑框元素 <textarea> API 而开发的增强版 <textarea> 运行库（迷你版代码编辑器）。它只有不到 2kb 大小，但它能大大增强您在编辑代码时的体验。(MIT License)

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight, zero-dependency JavaScript tooltip library that uses CSS custom properties for full styling flexibility. Tooltips can be triggered on hover or displayed permanently, with configurable delay, offset, and positioning.
